result.execSummary:
The defendant Damontrion Fayon Curb was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Defendant may petition to have matter expunged upon payment in full for fines/costs.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt: 2:31 PM Defendant Damontrion Fayon Curb in court.  Attorney Robert C Howard Iii in court for Damontrion Fayon Curb.  Prosecuting attorney Cheniqua White in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant pleads no contest. Court finds defendant guilty. Court orders $50 plus costs due within 60 days and defendant may petition to have matter expunged upon payment in full for fines/costs.
Plea hearing on October 26, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Pre-trial conference on January 4, 2023 at 11:00 am.

11:36 AM Defendant Damontrion Fayon Curb appeared by video.  Attorney Robert C Howard Iii in court for Damontrion Fayon Curb.  Prosecuting attorney David S Olson in court for the State of Wisconsin. Matter to be set.

11:20 AM Prosecuting attorney Alexander David Goulart in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Damontrion Fayon Curb appeared by video. Court finds the defendant indigent and appoints attorney Robert Howard. Defendant to reimburse the County $100 per month.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 8, 2022 at 11:15 am.
Indigency hearing on August 18, 2022 at 11:15 am.

records.addlTxt: 2:19 PM Prosecuting attorney Noah M Tylenda and intern Verity Altenberger appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Damontrion Fayon Curb appeared by video. Defendant pleads not guilty. Matter to be set. Defendant to file petition for Court appointed attorney.
Adjourned initial appearance on August 3, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

Activity:  Initial appearance

Not to possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription.

11:19 AM  Prosecuting attorney Margaret Nan Ginocchio appeared by video supervising intern Verity Altenberger by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Damontrion Fayon Curb appeared by phone. Warrant vacated when case was called at 10:46 am. 
 Complaint filed, copy to defendant, address and date of birth confirmed, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Signature bond of $1000 set.  Not to possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription.  Defendant must sign bond July 13, 2022 between 12 pm and 1 pm.  Defendant to contact public defender.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 3, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Initial appearance on July 12, 2022 at 10:00 am.
